quote: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow - Chinese Proverb
Try to manager your anger since people can't manage their stupidity - 101 Quotes About.com
For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness - Ralph Waldo Emerson
activities: Distract yourself - listen to music, read a book, watch a movie or find your happy place
Discuss your anger with someone trustworthy
Cool off with exercise - walking, gardening, cleaning, kickboxing or running

quote: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody - Stephen Chbosky
What brings us to tears will lead us to grace. Out pain is never wasted - Bob Goff
Where there is no struggle, there is no strength - Oprah Winfrey
activities: Eat the best chocolate you can get your hands on!
Hang out with friends who can make you feel good

quote: All is disgust when a man leaves his own nature and does what is unfit - Sophocles
Disgust and resolve are two of the great emotions -Jim Rohn
Fear is danger to your body, but disgust is danger to your soul - Diane Ackerman
activities: Recognize that help is needed - ask someone trustworth for advice
Ask questions of your internal experience "What do I need?", "How can I be with myself in the most supportive way?"

quote: Expect the unexpected. Life is full of wonderful things just waiting to surprise you. - Sweet Harmony
Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us - Boris Pasternak
To be surprised, to wonder, is to begin to understand. - Jose Ortega y Gasset
activities: Try not yo hit anyone or throw anything. That urge is your fight reaction
Breath in and out. You need to give yourself a few minutes to process this
Ask friends and families who are trustworthy for support

quote: Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up - Veronica Roth, Divergent
Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out. - Benjamin Franklin
Extreme Fear can neither fight or flight - William Shakespear
activities: Focus on your breathing. Breath through panic
Learn more about your fear. Talk to someone who you can trust.

quote: The less you care what others think, the happier you'll be - Quotereel.com
Happiness is the best makeup - Drew Barrymore
Keep smiling...and one day life will get tired of upsetting you. - DespicableMeMinions.org
activities: Give a compliment to somebody or give back to society
